column3: FAO 1.A.2.c Rice cultivation to IPCC 3.C.7 Rice Cultivation
FAO M.1.BCR (or 1.A.1.b + 1.A.2.b + 1.A.6.b + 1.A.7.b) Burning of crop residues to IPCC 3.C.1.b Biomass Burning In Croplands
FAO 6.A forest fires to IPCC M.3.C.1.a Biomass burning in forest lands (M category because it is not contained in the 3.C.1 sum)
FAO 6.B savanna fires to IPCC 3.C.1.c Biomass burning in grasslands
FAO 6.C Fires in organic soils to IPCC 3.B.3 cropland (fires in organic soils)
